name: portall
tagline: A self-hosted dashboard for shortcuts and widgets
description: Portall is a self-hosted dashboard that displays shortcuts to internal apps, stats, and widgets. Designed for homelab users, it simplifies navigation across multiple services.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Display shortcuts to all your self-hosted services in one place

features.title: Custom Widgets
features.description: Add widgets for system stats, weather, RSS feeds, and other information

features.title: Link Organization
features.description: Group services into categories for better organization and navigation

features.title: Status Monitoring
features.description: Check service availability with health checks and uptime indicators

features.title: Custom Icons
features.description: Use custom icons and logos for each service for visual identification

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Quickly find services by name with built-in search

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access dashboard from any device with mobile-optimized layout

features.title: Bookmarklets
features.description: Add services easily with browser bookmarklets or manual entry
